pages.text: The set Crimtane gemstone, itself a creation of the Nether, can absorb high temperatures near you with ease. It even protects you from the blazing heat of lava - if only for a short time, until it has had a chance to cool down again.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Prevents damage from fire and hot floors. Extinguishes close fires and grants you a 15 second protection from lava.
